Sentencas: In this work, co-generation of C2+ hydrocarbons and electricity in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) was realized using methane as fuel.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: The SOFCs were prepared with Li-La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta (LSGM)/Lr0.7Sr0.3FeO3 (LSF) as the composite anode and LSGM and (La0.6Sr0.4)0.95Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF)/Sm0.2Ce0.8O2-delta (SDC) as the electrolyte and cathode, respectively.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: Among the anode materials, Li-LSGM has higher C2+ product selectivity.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: It can be seen from the XPS data that the doping of Li introduces a strong alkaline active center Li+O-, changes the lattice and electronic structure, and increases the surface absorption of oxygen species, which is more conducive to the improvement of the selectivity of C2+ products.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: LSF has strong electron-conducting ability and high catalytic activity for methane.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: After mixing with Li-LSGM, XPS data show that more oxygen vacancies are generated, which is beneficial to the electrochemical reaction of the anode and effectively reduces carbon deposition.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the composite anode can reach 188.15 mW/cm-2 with H2 as the fuel at 850 degrees C, and a C2+ product selectivity of 57.48% is achieved with CH4 as the fuel at 800 degrees C and the current density is 40 mA/cm-2.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes

Sentencas: In addition, the change of C2+ product selectivity with current density and temperature during cell operation was further investigated, providing enlightenment on how to adjust the output ratio of chemicals and electricity.
Titulo: Co-Generation of Electricity and Chemicals via Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Li-Doped LSGM and LSF Composite Anodes
